content.html: We can now codify our dev environment as we do with our infra as code. We can treat our dev environment as cattle, not pets. Local dev is dead. Let’s move to the cloud. Let’s build alongside our cloud tools, forget emulation, forget heavy monolithic local replication.
content.value:
We can now codify our dev environment as we do with our infra as code. We can treat our dev environment as cattle, not pets.

Local dev is dead. Let’s move to the cloud. Let’s build alongside our cloud tools, forget emulation, forget heavy monolithic local replication.
